alert.note: Alert for Bakersfield; Buttonwillow - Lost Hills - I5; Delano-Wasco-Shafter; Los Banos - Dos Palos; South End San Joaquin Valley; Southeast San Joaquin Valley; West Side of Fresno and Kings Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued January 31 at 9:53AM PST until February 01 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 29 expected. * WHERE...The San Joaquin Valley. * WHEN...Until 9 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
